name: (VR)西汉帝陵 The Han Dynasty Imperial Mausoleums
developer: 派嘉数创科技有限公司
publisher: 派嘉数创科技有限公司
description: Entering emperor mausoleum of West Han Dynasty of thousands of years, feeling the magnificence and stories of the tomb owner.
minimum_requirements: OS:  Processor:  Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics:  DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS:  Processor:  Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics:  DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space
